name: unstylish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not fashionable or attractive: We are a very dull nation fashionwise - extremely unstylish and conservative. My first pair of glasses were large, round and unstylish, and by the time I was ten I regretted my choice. Opposite
stylish
More examplesFewer examplesWhen they bought the house, it was deeply unstylish, involving a lot of shiny, dark wood.The building's chic minimalism comes as a surprise in a neighbourhood of old, utterly unstylish hotels.The set design is curiously unstylish - a mixture of drab browns.
